itemDescription: Royal Navy officer, hydrographic surveyor, and author

wikipedia_page.main: Vice Admiral Henry Boyle Townshend Somerville,  (7 September 1863 – 24 March 1936), generally known as Boyle Somerville, was an Irishman who served in the Royal Navy. He was a maritime author, as well as publishing on ethnography and archaeology. He was shot dead by the IRA.
